attributes.action: Rename Manchester Airport the 'Mark E. Smith International Airport'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Liverpool has the John Lennon Airport and New York the JFK Airport. Mancunians have got boring old Manchester Airport. Come on Gordon, take this opportunity to honour a cultural icon of rock n' roll, the great Mark E. Smith of The Fall and retitle the airport The Mark E. Smith International Airport. You never know, he may even give you and Sarah some free tickets to one of his gigs and, if you're really lucky, a backstage pass.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
